metadata.title: CVE-2022-29577 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: OWASP AntiSamy before 1.6.7 allows XSS via HTML tag smuggling on STYLEcontent with crafted input. The output serializer does not properly encodethe supposed Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) content. NOTE: this issue existsbecause of an incomplete fix for CVE-2022-28367.

criterions.comment: libowasp-antisamy-java package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
